talk.author: did:plc:e2y6anym4guaucqjnark4w54
talk.utter: We had record inflation, the highest in US History.  But, but, but, it was higher in the 1980’s…it was, but the CPI changed over the years.  If you used apples to apples, Biden Harris had the worst ever.  Hilariously Core inflation today excludes food and energy lol. Educate yourself to true facts.

talk.author: did:plc:pcx2nhwk5ogq7vg5jf6c5pv4
talk.utter: what were the origins of that inflation?  how did the United States perform in relation to other countries and their economies?  what would a republican administration have done different that could have reduced global inflation?

talk.author: did:plc:e2y6anym4guaucqjnark4w54
talk.utter: Not done the last stimulus package that was not needed.  Totally stupid move.

talk.author: did:plc:e2y6anym4guaucqjnark4w54
talk.utter: Not done the last stimulus package that was not needed.  Totally stupid move.

talk.author: did:plc:pcx2nhwk5ogq7vg5jf6c5pv4
talk.utter:
if inflation was caused by the last stimulus package, why did all major world economies experience inflation at that same time?  if the stimulus package caused it, why did the U.S. economy under Biden fare better than most countries?

HINT: Inflation was primarily caused by a global pandemic.

talk.author: did:plc:e2y6anym4guaucqjnark4w54
talk.utter: The US dollar is the worlds reserve currency

talk.author: did:plc:e2y6anym4guaucqjnark4w54
talk.utter: The US dollar is the worlds reserve currency

talk.author: did:plc:pcx2nhwk5ogq7vg5jf6c5pv4
talk.utter: are you suggesting stopping the world’s economic engine for almost 2 years had no affect, but the second stimulus package caused worldwide inflation?  does that make sense?

talk.author: did:plc:e2y6anym4guaucqjnark4w54
talk.utter: Inflation was caused by a massive spike in M2.  Period.

talk.author: did:plc:e2y6anym4guaucqjnark4w54
talk.utter: Inflation was caused by the massive increase in M2, the money supply, and nothing else.

talk.author: did:plc:ayksffdbwd265rscsfjih4fv
talk.utter: Acting like there's a singular reason for inflation, which is influenced by multiple factors, kind of makes you seem like a non-serious partisan. Even if you're correct: it's meaningless unless you can compare what the economic outcome would have been if there were no stimulus or restrictions.

talk.author: did:plc:e2y6anym4guaucqjnark4w54
talk.utter: How is math or economics partisan?  We had inflation because of the increase in M2.  Prices didn’t go up.  Our dollars bought less goods. Not partisan, just a fact.
